name: Graviton
text: Formidable Foe — Forced Interrupt: When Graviton would take damage that would defeat him, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Prevent an amount of damage equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Graviton
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted ally. Exhaust each friendly character and support. Forced Interrupt: When Graviton would take damage that would defeat him, discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Prevent an amount of damage equal to the total number of boost icons ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Graviton
text: When Revealed: Discard each exhausted ally and support. Exhaust each friendly character and support. Forced Interrupt: When Graviton would take damage that would defeat him, discard 3 cards from the encounter deck. Prevent an amount of damage equal to the total number of boost icons ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Turning Into a Black Hole
text: After breaking free from his prison, Graviton conjures a cataclysmic black hole. Contents: Graviton (I) and Graviton (II). (Graviton (II) and Graviton (III) for expert mode.) Graviton, Dark Matter and Standard encounter set. One modular encounter set (Masters of Evil). Setup: Search the encounter deck for the Dark Matter environment and the Seismic Uprising side scheme and reveal them. (Shuffle.) Advance to stage 1B.

name: Turning Into a Black Hole
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 1 threat here or exhaust a character they control. Forced Interrupt: When threat is placed here, discard the top card of the encounter deck.

name: The Singularity
text: Earth's irreversible demise looms as the singularity draws near. When Revealed: Each player must exhaust 1 ally and 1 support they control. Deal 1 encounter card to each player. Advance to stage 2B.

name: The Singularity
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player must choose to either place 2 threat here or exhaust a character they control. Forced Interrupt: When threat is placed here, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Seismic Uprising
text: Graviton is tearing apart his former prison. Setup. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 prison counter here. If there are 4 or more prison counters here, flip this card. When Defeated: Place 3[per_hero] threat on the main scheme and remove this card from the game.

name: Flying Prison
text: When Revealed: In player order, each player must discard cards from the encounter deck until a non-[[dark matter]] minion is discarded, then put it into play engaged with them. Each friendly character without the [[aerial]] trait gets -1 THW and -1 ATK. Hero Action: As a group, the players exhaust 2[per_hero] characters → remove this card from the game.

name: Moon Crash
text: "Things down here are only gonna get worse. More meteors, gravity quakes..." - Sylvie Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, place 1 moon counter here. Then deal X indirect damage to each player, where X is the number of moon counters here. [acceleration]

name: Solar Gravitational Field
text: Graviton separated himself from Earth's gravitational field and is tuning to the Sun’s gravitational field instead. Forced Response: After your turn ends, heal 2 damage from Graviton. [amplify]

name: Gravity Pull
text: When Revealed: Exhaust an ally and a support you control. If no card is exhausted this way, exhaust your identity. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, the defender cannot ready until your next turn ends.

name: Graviton Blast
text: When Revealed: Discard each card with a printed [physical] resource from your hand. If no card was discarded this way, take 2 indirect damage. [star]Boost: Reveal this card.

name: City in Collapse
text: Surge. When Revealed: Discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck, where X is equal to the amount of threat on the main scheme. If no card was discarded this way, place 3 threat on the main scheme.

name: Graviton’s Reign
text: Surge. When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme in play. Heal X damage from Graviton, where X is equal to the amount of threat placed this way.

name: Graviton’s Grasp
text: Surge. When Revealed: Discard an exhausted ally under your control. Heal X damage from Graviton where X is equal to the printed cost of the discarded ally. If no ally was discarded this way, exhaust a character you control. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, it gains overkill.

name: Gravity Lockdown
text: Attach to your identity. Attached identity cannot make basic attacks or basic thwarts. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a [physical] resource → discard this card.

name: Gravity Nullification
text: Attach to Graviton. Reduce the damage Graviton takes from each attack from non-[[aerial]] characters by 1. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a [physical] resource → discard this card.

name: Graviton Presence
text: Attach to the ally you control with the most remaining hit points. If you cannot, this card gains surge. You cannot ready the attached ally. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend a [physical] resource → discard this card.

name: Blackout
text: [star]Forced Response: After Blackout attacks and damages a character, stun that character. [star]Boost: Stun the character you control with the highest ATK value.

name: Moonstone
text: Reduce the damage Moonstone takes from each attack from non-[[aerial]] characters by 1. [star]Boost: Exhaust an ally you control.

name: Dark Matter
text: Permanent. Setup. Forced Response: After an ally or support enters play under your control, spend a [physical] resource or exhaust it. It is everywhere. 85% of the matter of the Universe is dark matter.

name: Self Interacting Dark Matter
text: The ever-present dark matter particles seem to flicker and interact with one another. Hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Response: After you ready a character, deal 1 damage to it.

name: Dark Matter Excess
text: Dark Matter Excess cannot take damage. [star]Boost: Put Dark Matter Excess into play engaged with you. Dark matter barely interacts with normal matter. It is invisible and escapes all attempts to observe it.

name: Dark Matter Wind
text: When Revealed: Each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck. For each printed [energy] or [mental] resource a player discards this way, that player takes 1 indirect damage. A strong dark matter wind is coming from the Cygnus constellation.

name: Dark Matter Resonance
text: Attach to the villain. Attached villain gains steady. Forced Interrupt: When attached villain would be defeated, reset their hit points to 2[per_hero] instead, then discard this card. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card.

name: Dark Matter Entanglement
text: Attach to the ally you control with the most remaining hit points. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Response: After you ready attached ally, deal 1 damage to it. [star]Boost: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted ally you control.
